page.title: 08Winter in Sherford in 1985.
page.content: Winter in Sherford is good fun because you can go sledging when it snows. One morning we had just got to school when it started to snow. We played in the snow at "Breaktime" and tried to clear the playground. After dinner we went home because the snow was getting deep and the buses wouldn't be able to get up the road later. When we got home we went sledging. Most people did not have sledges because it does not snow very much here so they used plastic bags which got very hot. All the children in the village were sledging in the same field. Some people were having races. When we went over a bump on our sledge it broke so we had to use plastic bags. I made a snowman for my baby brother, then we had a snowball fight. It was good fun when it snowed. Everyone in the village had fun and no one got stuck on the road.
